Y or N | | melCategory | `'string'` | The MEL item code | | engineerId | `'string'` | ID of the engineer who handled the MEL item work order | | restriction | `'string'` | Restriction details for related MEL item | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Aircraft Weight & Balance Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :--------------------------- | :----------: | :----------------------------------------------------------- | | regId | `'string'` | Registration number of aircraft | | recordWorkOrderId | `'string'` | Unique identifier of the weight and balance record work order| | recordDate | `'dateTime'` | Record date of the weight and balance data in UTC | | recordType | `'string'` | Indicates how the weight and balance record is created: A - Automatic, W - Weighing, M - Manual | | registerarId | `'string'` | Id of the system user who creates the weight and balance record| | description | `'string'` | Description of the weight and balance work order | | documentNumber | `'string'` | Number of the document linked to the weight and balance work order | | type | `'string'` |

Type of the weight and balance information for an aircraft: 

  • "Basic Data" for the weight and balance information excluding operational items. 
  • "Operational Data" for the weight and balance information including operational items. 
  • "Reported Changes" for any changes reported to the aircraft’s weight and balance.
| | weight | `'number'` | Weight of the aircraft | | unitOfWeight | `'string'` | Measurement unit of the weight | | centerOfGravity | `'number'` | Center of gravity of the aircraft | | unitOfCenterOfGravity | `'string'` | Measurement unit of the center of gravity | | moment | `'number'` | Aircraft's moment | | index | `'number'` | Aircraft's index | | meanAerodynamicChord | `'number'` | Mean aerodynamica chord of the aircraft | | lateralCenterOfGravity | `'n
